summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Laura Hoff and Jenne Waldron regarding a loan certificate related to individuals named Ratcliffe and Vickers. The email indicates a request for documentation and includes a confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Laura Hoff
persons.context: Laura Hoff is the sender of the email correspondence regarding the loan certificate.

persons.name: Jenne Waldron
persons.context: Jenne Waldron is the recipient of the email and provides the requested loan certificate.

persons.name: Ratcliffe
persons.context: Ratcliffe is mentioned in the context of a loan certificate being requested.

persons.name: Vickers
persons.context: Vickers is mentioned alongside Ratcliffe in relation to the loan certificate.

connections.description: Laura Hoff is communicating with Jenne Waldron, who is an administrative assistant.
Ratcliffe and Vickers are associated with the same loan certificate.

keyFacts: The document is an email correspondence dated November 3, 2014.
Laura Hoff is requesting a loan certificate related to Ratcliffe and Vickers.
Jenne Waldron responds with the requested certificate.
The email includes a confidentiality notice regarding the information contained within.
The document mentions a specific PO Box address in Charlene, NC.
